rg_functionality = "Next Generation Firewall" AND ((requestclientapplication CONTAINS "jndi" AND (requestclientapplication CONTAINS "dns" OR requestclientapplication CONTAINS "ldap" OR requestclientapplication CONTAINS "lower" OR requestclientapplication CONTAINS "rmi" OR requestclientapplication CONTAINS "upper" OR requestclientapplication CONTAINS "nis" OR requestclientapplication CONTAINS "iiop" OR requestclientapplication CONTAINS "corba" OR requestclientapplication CONTAINS "nds" OR requestclientapplication CONTAINS "http")) OR (requestclientapplication CONTAINS "//" AND (requestclientapplication CONTAINS "${lower:" OR requestclientapplication CONTAINS "${upper:" OR requestclientapplication CONTAINS "${::" OR requestclientapplication CONTAINS "$%7Bjndi" OR requestclientapplication CONTAINS "$%7Benv:" OR requestclientapplication CONTAINS "${env:" OR requestclientapplication CONTAINS "${base64:")))
rg_functionality = "Next Generation Firewall" AND ((requesturl CONTAINS "jndi" AND (requesturl CONTAINS "dns" OR requesturl CONTAINS "ldap" OR requesturl CONTAINS "lower" OR requesturl CONTAINS "rmi" OR requesturl CONTAINS "upper" OR requesturl CONTAINS "nis" OR requesturl CONTAINS "nds" OR requesturl CONTAINS "corba" OR requesturl CONTAINS "iiop" OR requesturl CONTAINS "http")) OR (requesturl CONTAINS "//" AND (requesturl CONTAINS "${lower:" OR requesturl CONTAINS "${upper:" OR requesturl CONTAINS "${::" OR requesturl CONTAINS "$%7Bjndi" OR requesturl CONTAINS "$%7Benv:" OR requesturl CONTAINS "${env:" OR requesturl CONTAINS "${base64:")))
rg_functionality = "Web Server" AND ((message CONTAINS "jndi" AND (message CONTAINS "dns" OR message CONTAINS "ldap" OR message CONTAINS "lower" OR message CONTAINS "rmi" OR message CONTAINS "upper" OR message CONTAINS "nis" OR message CONTAINS "iiop" OR message CONTAINS "corba" OR message CONTAINS "nds" OR message CONTAINS "http")) OR (message CONTAINS "//" AND (message CONTAINS "${lower:" OR message CONTAINS "${upper:" OR message CONTAINS "${::" OR message CONTAINS "$%7Bjndi" OR message CONTAINS "$%7Benv:" OR message CONTAINS "${env:" OR message CONTAINS "${base64:")))

rg_functionality="Next generation firewall" AND  requestclientapplication CONTAINS "jndi" AND ( requestclientapplication CONTAINS "dns" OR requestclientapplication CONTAINS "ldap" OR requestclientapplication CONTAINS "lower" OR requestclientapplication CONTAINS "rmi" OR requestclientapplication CONTAINS "upper" ) 
rg_functionality="Next generation firewall" AND requestclientapplication CONTAINS "://"  AND ( requestclientapplication CONTAINS "${upper:" OR requestclientapplication CONTAINS "${lower:" OR requestclientapplication CONTAINS "${::" ) 
rg_functionality="Web application firewall" AND requestclientapplication CONTAINS "jndi"  AND ( requestclientapplication CONTAINS "dns" OR requestclientapplication CONTAINS "ldap" OR requestclientapplication CONTAINS "lower" OR requestclientapplication CONTAINS "rmi" OR requestclientapplication CONTAINS "upper" ) 
rg_functionality="Web application firewall" AND requestclientapplication CONTAINS "://" AND ( requestclientapplication CONTAINS "${upper:" OR requestclientapplication CONTAINS "${lower:" OR requestclientapplication CONTAINS "${::" ) 
rg_functionality="web server" AND requestclientapplication CONTAINS "jndi" AND ( requestclientapplication CONTAINS "dns" OR requestclientapplication CONTAINS "ldap" OR requestclientapplication CONTAINS "lower" OR requestclientapplication CONTAINS "rmi" OR requestclientapplication CONTAINS "upper" ) 
rg_functionality="web server" AND requestclientapplication CONTAINS "://"  AND ( requestclientapplication CONTAINS "${upper:" OR requestclientapplication CONTAINS "${lower:" OR requestclientapplication CONTAINS "${::" ) 
rg_functionality="Web proxy" AND requestclientapplication CONTAINS "jndi" ) AND ( requestclientapplication CONTAINS "dns" OR requestclientapplication CONTAINS "ldap" OR requestclientapplication CONTAINS "lower" OR requestclientapplication CONTAINS "rmi" OR requestclientapplication CONTAINS "upper" ) 
rg_functionality="Web proxy" AND requestclientapplication CONTAINS "://"  AND ( requestclientapplication CONTAINS "${upper:" OR requestclientapplication CONTAINS "${lower:" OR requestclientapplication CONTAINS "${::" ) 
rg_functionality="Next generation firewall" AND requesturl CONTAINS "jndi"  AND ( requesturl CONTAINS "dns" OR requesturl CONTAINS "ldap" OR requesturl CONTAINS "lower" OR requesturl CONTAINS "rmi" OR requesturl CONTAINS "upper" ) 
rg_functionality="Next generation firewall" AND requesturl CONTAINS "://"  AND ( requesturl CONTAINS "${upper:" OR requesturl CONTAINS "${lower:" OR requesturl CONTAINS "${::" ) 
rg_functionality="Web proxy" AND requesturl CONTAINS "jndi" AND ( requesturl CONTAINS "dns" OR requesturl CONTAINS "ldap" OR requesturl CONTAINS "lower" OR requesturl CONTAINS "rmi" OR requesturl CONTAINS "upper" ) 
rg_functionality="Web proxy" AND requesturl CONTAINS "://" AND ( requesturl CONTAINS "${upper:" OR requesturl CONTAINS "${lower:" OR requesturl CONTAINS "${::" ) 
rg_functionality="web server" AND requesturl CONTAINS "jndi"  AND ( requesturl CONTAINS "dns" OR requesturl CONTAINS "ldap" OR requesturl CONTAINS "lower" OR requesturl CONTAINS "rmi" OR requesturl CONTAINS "upper" ) 
rg_functionality="Web serverproxy" AND requesturl CONTAINS "://" AND ( requesturl CONTAINS "${upper:" OR requesturl CONTAINS "${lower:" OR requesturl CONTAINS "${::" ) 
rg_functionality="Web application firewall" AND requesturl CONTAINS "jndi" ) AND ( requesturl CONTAINS "dns" OR requesturl CONTAINS "ldap" OR requesturl CONTAINS "lower" OR requesturl CONTAINS "rmi" OR requesturl CONTAINS "upper" )
rg_functionality="Web application firewall" AND requesturl CONTAINS "://" AND ( requesturl CONTAINS "${upper:" OR requesturl CONTAINS "${lower:" OR requesturl CONTAINS "${::" ) 
rg_functionality="web server" AND requestcontext CONTAINS "jndi"  AND ( requestcontext CONTAINS "dns" OR requestcontext CONTAINS "ldap" OR requestcontext CONTAINS "lower" OR requestcontext CONTAINS "rmi" OR requestcontext CONTAINS "upper" )
rg_functionality="web server" AND requestcontext CONTAINS "://" AND ipaddress NOT NULL ) AND ( requestcontext CONTAINS "${upper:" OR requestcontext CONTAINS "${lower:" OR requestcontext CONTAINS "${::" )
rg_functionality="Web proxy" AND requestcontext CONTAINS "jndi" ) AND ( requestcontext CONTAINS "dns" OR requestcontext CONTAINS "ldap" OR requestcontext CONTAINS "lower" OR requestcontext CONTAINS "rmi" OR requestcontext CONTAINS "upper" )
rg_functionality="Web proxy"  AND requestcontext CONTAINS "://" AND ( requestcontext CONTAINS "${upper:" OR requestcontext CONTAINS "${lower:" OR requestcontext CONTAINS "${::" ) 
rg_functionality="Web application firewall" AND requestcontext CONTAINS "jndi" ) AND ( requestcontext CONTAINS "dns" OR requestcontext CONTAINS "ldap" OR requestcontext CONTAINS "lower" OR requestcontext CONTAINS "rmi" OR requestcontext CONTAINS "upper" ) 
rg_functionality="Web application firewallWeb proxy" AND requestcontext CONTAINS "://" AND ipaddress NOT NULL ) AND ( requestcontext CONTAINS "${upper:" OR requestcontext CONTAINS "${lower:" OR requestcontext CONTAINS "${::" )
